transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir ji good morning.
Customer: Good morning kaise good morning.
Executive: Badhiya sir badhiya apna batayiye na.
Customer: Badhiya hai sir.
Executive: Badhiya violet ka fir hua kab se share kiya tha complaint kya dikkat aa gaya sir violet mein.
Customer: Violet mein lead hi nahi raha yaar sir dekho.
Executive: Sir violet violet aa rahi hai but jitna chahiye na us hisab se nahi aa rahi but apne hisab se jitna lead hai na utna to aa hi raha hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jis hisab se aapke hai na apne pass.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Dekho abhi apna jo hai na khurak jo hai na ye high sold category hai maine pehle bhi bataya aapko thoda sa active rehna padega samjhe.
Customer: Thoda beech mein abhi season start hua tha to violet abhi sir season bhi down hua hai season start tha to violet thoda jyada generate hua tha to waha pe aapko lead dikhti thi lekin abhi season thoda sa down hua hai na to violet generation kam ho rahi hai inquiry ka follow kam hai automatic aapko thoda sa active hona padega.
Executive: Kyunki lead post hoti hai ek lead se char logo ke pass.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji batayiye.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Main ye keh raha tha direct jaise inquiry hai message hai ya koi calls wagera hai.
Executive: Message pe sir direct jo direct inquiry karta hai wo aapko malum aapko malum hai sir.
Customer: Samjhe to direct inquiry kar raha hai wo aapko malum hai kyunki aapke local wale itne message inquiry kar dete hain na ki kya hi kar sakte hain direct inquiry wo log.
Customer: Samjhe ek dusre ke competition mein hi wo log itne sare inquiry kar rahe hain waha pe but usme usme bhi sare inquiry mein kuch kuch kuch kuch ek do inquiry aise hai jo bahar ke aati hai jo aap usme kam kar sakte hain baki lagbhag lagbhag hame sab alwar ka hi inquiry dikh raha direct waha ka.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Samjhe to sir inquiry nahi raha kya kare.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello abhi abhi last abhi violet ka to last do teen do week se issue ho raha hai na ye nahi diwali ke baad aisa ho raha hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usse pehle to theek thak aa rahi thi response kaisa raha hai uske hisab se aapka.
Customer: Response nahi aa raha koi party party hai wo thoda sa trust nahi kar rahi hai number share karu aapko baat kar lete agar kuch ho jaye to.
Executive: Kya bol kya raha hai wo party?
Customer: Wo matlab uske sath koi cheating ho gaya pehle Jaipur to trust nahi kar pa raha hai ki delivery hoga nahi hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Abhi aap available hai kya system pe ya mobile application pe hai na.
Executive: Mobile application pe available hai kya abhi aap.
Customer: Haan mobile application pe available hu.
Executive: Aapko hum video meeting ka link share kar rahe hai ek baar join kijiye.
Customer: Achcha achcha to usme kya karna hai apne ko.
Executive: Isko dekhte hain sir.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Chaliye kariye ek baar aap dekhte hain.
Executive: Maine aapko bheja hai na aapke jo register mail id hai maine bheja aapka.
Customer: Ek baar check kijiye.
Executive: Mobile se join karenge na.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Abhi dekhiye recent pe koi lead hi nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Kya bole sir?
Customer: Abhi recent pe ja ke dekhte hain na to koi lead hi show nahi karta hai.
Executive: Lead abhi available hai hi nahi uska ek hi lead hai jo I think wo brass ka shayad hai wo brass ka maine category hata rakha fir bhi brass ka brass ka dikh raha photo me to photo se brass ka dikh raha hai.
Executive: Duda bahanam karke hai three feet ka main check karunga.
Customer: Score wagera to karwa dete aap score to dekh hi sakte hain.
Executive: Kya system?
Customer: Score score jo ki product ka score jo show kar raha hai abhi.
Executive: Ek minute join kijiye wo bhi wo bhi dekhte hain abhi.
Executive: Kiska aap bol rahe hain wo bhi hum check kar lete hain product score jo aata hai na.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm wo.
Executive: Mail mila aapko?
Customer: Mail to check karta hu ek bari.
Executive: Mobile se join karenge kya?
Customer: Haan mobile se hoga join.
Executive: Ek baar hum aapko is pe dal dete hain fir to.
Executive: Whatsapp pe bhej diya link wo jo jo mail pe kiya na same copy paste karke whatsapp pe dal diya aapko ye whatsapp se join kar lijiye theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab call cut kar join kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer says a party doesn't trust them.

- Customer is not seeing any leads in recent.

- Wants score to be visible.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about high sold category.

- Executive explained about the season down.

- Executive shared a video meeting link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trust, score, video meeting
